images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Tokyo in summer, showcasing the vibrant atmosphere of festivals and nightlife.
AI-selected This destination image will highlight unique cultural aspects and iconic landmarks of Tokyo, aligning with the campaign's focus on cultural travel.
AI-selected These icons will be used to highlight special offers and promotions, assisting users in navigating the email content effectively.
AI-selected These icons will be used to highlight special offers and promotions, assisting users in navigating the email content effectively.
AI-selected These icons will be used to highlight special offers and promotions, assisting users in navigating the email content effectively.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to reinforce brand identity and recognition throughout the campaign.
AI-selected This background pattern will enhance the overall visual appeal of the email, creating a lively and engaging atmosphere.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Токио in summer
assetRequirements.visual_style: modern and colorful, reflecting urban culture and nightlife
assetRequirements.content_context: A captivating view of Tokyo's skyline at night with festival lights and cultural elements

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight summer festivals in Tokyo
assetRequirements.visual_style: bright and lively, showcasing cultural festivities
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of summer festivals in Tokyo, featuring traditional attire and activities

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Токио ждет тебя!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Tokyo in summer, showcasing the vibrant atmosphere of festivals and nightlife.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
